name: Apocalypse Never (itch)
description:
"If you're late today, even by just one single minute... I'm going to put you six feet in the ground!!"

Lazy shut-in Seryozha is always late to everything, no matter what. But it seems his friend has finally had enough, so if he's late one more time, Seryozha's very life could be on the line. Good thing he woke up on time, but there’s one little problem...he’s locked in his house and can’t get out!

Apocalypse Never is a short comedic escape game created by Colonel using the RPG Maker VX Ace engine, and was first released on the 19th of October 2016. The English version was translated by HiragiHOUX, and released on the 30th of December 2016.

In 2021, it received an update featuring entirely new, stylish art, updated dialogue and graphics, and a brand new bonus scenario. That's this version.

Explore Seryozha's house, interact with items, and figure out how to escape...and don't be late!

The game takes roughly 15 minutes, so that's maybe 40 minutes to get all endings for the main scenario.

Characters

Sergei "Seryozha" Tolstoy

The game’s protagonist.
A lazy man who’s late so frequently it borders on a crime.

Hariton Arensky

Seryozha’s friend who gets one step closer to murdering him every time he’s late.
